post_text: Finding form at a crucial time Man City win three in a row for the first time since October But All the clubs here defeated Man Utd Home&Away Liverpool, City, Forest, Arsenal...the EPL table will be finished this way If Liverpool eventually loose all their matches, City will be champions Citizens always have a good run at the end of the season...it will win all its matches Many fans who support other teams thought Manchester city won't be in top four due to poor performance we've been experiencing this season but here we are, in top four. Forever Manchester city, and Barcelona supporter. wins in a row and without Halland arsenal has never won english premier league. The only league that they have won was barclay's premier league Champion of Europe Consistency, is what characterizes Pep Guardiola.Believe me, next year he will be competing in UEFA,a not reachable goal to most coaches.Let's all put off our hats to show respect to the goat of football. That’s standard for Man City. Make everyone think that they are losing it.
